title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competency: 3D Printing-Based Mathematics Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (geometry, spatial awareness, measurement)
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners visualize mathematical concepts using 3D modeling tools and enhance spatial reasoning skills

Through a 4-week project-based assessment, learners model a real-world problem mathematically, prototype one physical model using 3D printing software (e.g., Tinkercad), and achieve ≥70/100 points based on teacher evaluation criteria (Functionality 40%, Creativity 30%, Completeness 30%)
Through collaborative activities, learners explore practical applications of mathematical concepts and improve creativity metrics by over 20%
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
